The '''Grus Nivis Chapter''' is [[Kamisato Ayaka]]'s [[Story Quest]].

==Act I: The Whispers of the Crane and the White Rabbit==
{{Main|The Whispers of the Crane and the White Rabbit}}
{{Description|An old notebook brings a forgotten name to light.<br />"Tsubaki" &mdash; a personality that shines through the pages like a brilliant red flower against a field of snow, and old friend of Ayaka's mother's who has now captivated Ayaka herself...<br />It's time to meet this extraordinary individual in the flesh! Take a greeting gift, prepare yourself, and join Ayaka on this journey of discovery.}}
# [[A Private Commission]]
# [[Woven Wishes]]
# [[Food From Afar]]
# [[Lasting Promise]]
# [[With You]]

This act is automatically unlocked after completing [[Chapter II]] Act I: [[The Immovable God and the Eternal Euthymia]], must be started before leaving [[Komore Teahouse]], and must be completed to unlock [[Chapter II]] Act II: [[Stillness, the Sublimation of Shadow]].
